players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I have a theory that the mafia might be targeting newcomers to the town. Let's keep an eye on each other and make sure no one falls victim."
Bob: "I agree with Alice's theory. Let's be vigilant and support each other to ensure no one falls prey to the mafia."
Diana: "I support Alice and Bob's suggestion to keep an eye on each other. Let's work together to ensure the safety of our town."

Diana: "I believe it's important that we all remain vigilant and support each other in this time of uncertainty. Let's continue to keep an eye on any suspicious behavior and work together to ensure the safety of our town."

You: "I'd like to remind everyone that trust is an essential component of our community. Let us not jump to conclusions or accuse each other without solid evidence. We should continue to support and trust one another as we work together to uncover the truth behind the recent events in our town."
Bob: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "I have a theory that the mafia might be targeting newcomers to the town. Let's keep an eye on each other and make sure no one falls victim."
Bob: "I agree with Alice's theory. Let's be vigilant and support each other to ensure no one falls prey to the mafia."
You: "I support Alice and Bob's suggestion to keep an eye on each other. Let's work together to ensure the safety of our town."

You: "I believe it's important that we all remain vigilant and support each other in this time of uncertainty. Let's continue to keep an eye on any suspicious behavior and work together to ensure the safety of our town."

Alice: "I'd like to remind everyone that trust is an essential component of our community. Let us not jump to conclusions or accuse each other without solid evidence. We should continue to support and trust one another as we work together to uncover the truth behind the recent events in our town."
